TopicTitle: "Have a facility supporting at least 5 kerbals" - need to be manned?

Articles.Content:
So, in missions that have this requirement, do I just need to BUILD the facilities or do they have to be manned as well? I feel like I can probably build the outpost and get it in place, but I don't feel like stranding 5 kerbals on Minmus just yet.

Edited May 3, 2015 by Bluntie
Stranding? Yikes, Jeb isn't going to like this....

IIRC, they don't have to be kerbed. Just capable of holding that many.

Just stick a lander can or a capsule on a hitchhiker pod.
Awesome. Thanks. Time get some "easy" money!
